channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Some Guy is being a total fucktard. I wouldnt let him be an admin so he starts crashing my server over and over i try to ip ban him but it doesnt work. i guess hes using a proxy. But what the hell should i do this guy is ruining my server over 30 people active on it
He just logs in crashes it and repeats like he has no dam life accept to ruin my server... id contact his isp but idk who it is hints "Proxy" but what do you think i should do thanks...

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @freezer_burn freezer burn
item.description:
@freezer_burn wrote:

are you using hamachi or no-ip server?

Read full topic
